messageBody:
From: <anand_73@...>

Subject: [junit] Re: Servlet Testing - junit or httpunit


> Thanks Toyin
>
> The confusion arises as to when to use httpunit or cactus.
>
> Also the starting point for Servlet testing isn't very clear compared
> to writing test cases for a generic Java class using JUnit.

Another approach is to use MockObjects (www.mockobjects.com). There's a simple example servlet with the code.

Steve
